item.title:
A @SciImmunology study from last year found that Th17 cells cultured under OXPHOS conditions were resistant to apoptosis. This approach may be useful for improving T cell persistence in ACT immunotherapy.
Learn more: https://t.co/9wS4W2I6Ki https://t.co/tcWWnW1ZV5
